name: f5-cloud-libs
description: Common library code for deploying a BIG-IP in a cloud environment

scripts.test: if ! node_modules/nodeunit/bin/nodeunit --reporter eclipse test/lib; then exit 1; fi; if ! node_modules/nodeunit/bin/nodeunit --reporter eclipse test/scripts; then exit 1; fi
scripts.coveralls: node_modules/jscoverage/bin/jscoverage lib && TEST_COVERAGE=1 node_modules/nodeunit/bin/nodeunit --reporter=lcov test/lib | node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js
